data.eml:eml: New species of Hyposmocoma (Lepidoptera, Cosmopterigidae) from the remote Northwestern Hawaiian Islands of Laysan, Necker, and Nihoa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmitz, Patrick, Rubinoff, Daniel (2009): New species of Hyposmocoma (Lepidoptera, Cosmopterigidae) from the remote Northwestern Hawaiian Islands of Laysan, Necker, and Nihoa. Zootaxa 2272: 37-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190995
